haverest moon male chacters by game
1.content:
You’re a man in his late 20's who has been working a desk job for 5+ years now. Even though it seems exciting to most (sarcasm) you have always inspired to become something more fulfilling and creative. So, one day you arrive home from your busy day at the office. Tired and ready to just sit alone in your single apartment to enjoy an evening of tv dinner. But to your surprise a package is at your door in which you open to see a letter from your mother that reads *found some of your old things was wondering if you wanted them. Love mom*.

You take it inside and search through the junk. One thing you find that sticks out to you is your old game system and a harvest Moon game. With nostalgia on your mind you begin to plugin and play. "The message comes on the screen in typical harvest moon game fashion that reads (are you ready to quit your job and become a farmer)". In which you say yes....

Your sucked into the world of Harvest moon. Being confused and very scared you look around at your new environment to see a little guy thing with a pointy hat that greets you. Thinking that this guy was crazy you shoved him away from you trying to get forward. This angry the sprite and he decided to shrink you and then he teleport you out of his sight…

Where do you end up?
1.title: The story begins

1142.content:
The teleportation has caused you to fall asleep, you are awaken by a sound of a tool hitting a metal floor that your laying on underneath a desk. You begin to open your eyes and wonder about what just happen to you. And thinking about that little guy if he was a real person.

While scratching your head in thought, you begin to look around at your surroundings and begin to see that your in a lab and its huge. Then you hear a voice coming from a distance. Before you can even realize how much bigger the lab is compared to you. a red sneaker comes booming around the corner that is pretty big compared to your size of...

how tall did you shrink to

info.brief_description: A man who has worked hard his entire life, gets a chance of a lifetime.
info.description:
You’re a man in his late 20’s who works a dead-end job and wants to do something more creative. After finding his old harvest moon game. He plays it and is somehow sucked into it after pressing yes. When he wakes the man is greeted by a harvest sprite who introduces himself and welcomes you to your new farm. You then somehow anger the harvest sprite, so he decides to shrink you and teleport you to somewhere random… (decide what happens next?)

Rule's:
-let me start with male/female giants/giantess are allowed
-any harvest moon game characters are allowed and so are star dew valley characters
-the intro story is an easy starter but feel free to create a new starter story
-feel free to add
-you can mix games, so just treat each game as a location on a map
